name: WMIC bypass using remote XSL file
description: Executes the code specified within a XSL script using a remote payload. Open Calculator.exe when test successfully executed, while AV turned off.

input_arguments.name: remote_xsl_file
input_arguments.description: Remote location of an XSL payload.

input_arguments.name: wmic_command
input_arguments.description: WMI command to execute using wmic.exe
